慈利.definition: Cili county in Zhangjiajie 張家界|张家界[Zhang1 jia1 jie4], Hunan

慈悲為本.definition: mercy as the guiding principle (idiom); the Buddhist teaching that nothing is valid except compassion

慈愛.definition: love; devotion (to children); affection, esp. towards children

慈江道.definition: Chagang province, in the north of North Korea

慈溪市.definition: Cixi, county-level city in Ningbo 寧波市|宁波市[Ning2bo1 Shi4], Zhejiang

慈濟.definition: Tzu Chi Foundation, an international humanitarian NGO established in 1966 in Taiwan

慈眉善目.definition: lit. kind brows, pleasant eyes (idiom); fig. amiable looking; benign-faced

慈禧.definition: Empress Dowager Cixi or Ts'u Hsi (reigned 1861-1908)

慈禧太后.definition: Empress Dowager Cixi or Ts'u Hsi (1835-1908), regent 1861-1908
